content:
PROCEDURE CODE
1184
If difficulties arise or if requests are made for the administration of the undivided estate or mass, or for other causes, and if they are not referred to by the other parties, the notary shall refer the matter to the justice of the peace who shall place his order on the original of the minutes.
If the parties fail to agree on the person to whom the inventoried items are to be entrusted, the notary is automatically constituted the custodian of the securities, cash, valuables, documents and papers.
For the remainder, the inventoried items will be entrusted to the person designated by the Justice of the Peace, at the request of the notary.
